title: American Airlines Expands App Features to Give Customers More Control During Travel Disruptions
summary: American Airlines has expanded its app features to enhance customer experience during travel disruptions. The new self-service tools focus on transparency, personalization, and real-time journey management, giving customers more control. This move aligns with the trend of businesses leveraging technology to improve customer service and experience.
hook: American Airlines boosts CX with app enhancements for travel disruptions.

title: ServiceNow and OpenAI Push AI Past Chatbots into Real CX Work
summary: ServiceNow and OpenAI have partnered to push AI beyond chatbots and into real customer experience (CX) work. They aim to bridge the gap between customer requests and actual resolution by targeting speech agents and legacy automation. The partnership signifies a strategic shift in the CCaaS space, leveraging AI to improve customer interactions and resolutions.
hook: ServiceNow and OpenAI redefine CX with AI, bridging customer request-resolution gap.

title: The $50 Billion Question: How Do You Charge for an AI Agent Seat That Doesn’t Exist?
summary: Autonomous AI agents are handling 30-40% of work that previously required human agents in the contact center space, leading to pricing challenges as many CX platforms still price based on human value units. This has resulted in CFOs demanding discounts, vendors absorbing compute volatility, and pricing teams having to redesign contracts. The article was published on January 20, 2026.
hook: AI agents disrupting pricing models in the $50 billion CX industry.

title: Accelerate Intelligent Automation and Innovate with Low Code
summary: The article emphasizes the need for organizations to embrace intelligent automation to modernize and innovate across the enterprise. It promotes the use of a single platform for delivering modern workflows, apps, and automation at scale. The article also discusses how to innovate quickly while governing for scale by democratizing the development of cross-enterprise workflows.
hook: Embrace intelligent automation for enterprise-wide innovation and modernization!
